name: Beethoven
description:
Back of Box - Game Boy (Europe) (from Ad Blurbs)

It's canine chaos as Beethoven turns the town upside down looking for his missing puppies! Explore all the puppies' favorite hangouts the Neighborhood, the Park, Downtown, the Supermarket, and more in this dog-gone mystery adventure.

releases.country: France, Germany, The Netherlands, Spain, United Kingdom
